title: Stone Game II
content:
Alice and Bob continue their games with piles of stones.  There are a number of piles arranged in a row, and each pile has a positive integer number of stones .  The objective of the game is to end with the most stones. 
Alice and Bob take turns, with Alice starting first.  Initially, .
On each player's turn, that player can take all the stones in the first  remaining piles, where .  Then, we set .
The game continues until all the stones have been taken.
Assuming Alice and Bob play optimally, return the maximum number of stones Alice can get.
